trans-unit.source: Get started with advanced Azure API Management configuration
trans-unit.target: Get started with advanced Azure API Management configuration

trans-unit.source: Learn how to trace calls, configure rate limit and quota policies, and customize the developer portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to trace calls, configure rate limit and quota policies, and customize the developer portal.

trans-unit.source: Get started with advanced Azure API Management configuration
trans-unit.target: Get started with advanced Azure API Management configuration

trans-unit.source: The tutorials in this section provide guidance an advanced API Management configuration and tasks.
trans-unit.target: The tutorials in this section provide guidance an advanced API Management configuration and tasks.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial shows you how to modify the look and feel of the developer portal for consistency with your brand.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Customizing the developer portal in Azure API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial shows you how to modify the look and feel of the developer portal for consistency with your brand.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>How to use the API Inspector to trace calls in Azure API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial shows how to use API Inspector to trace and collect information about operation calls.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How to use the API Inspector to trace calls in Azure API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial shows how to use API Inspector to trace and collect information about operation calls.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Protect your API with rate limits using Azure API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial demonstrates how to configure rate limit and quota policies, and then gives a demo of invoking operations until the rate limit is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Protect your API with rate limits using Azure API Management[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial demonstrates how to configure rate limit and quota policies, and then gives a demo of invoking operations until the rate limit is exceeded.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>How to delegate user registration and product subscription[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial shows how to to use your existing website for handling developer sign-in/sign-up and subscription to products as opposed to using the built-in functionality in the developer portal.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How to delegate user registration and product subscription[]</linkText><title></title></link> - This tutorial shows how to to use your existing website for handling developer sign-in/sign-up and subscription to products as opposed to using the built-in functionality in the developer portal.
